password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update email set host = #{host,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eamil_addr = #{eamilAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select top 1 * from email where type=1
